name: Play it again Sam 4
overview: A compilation of 4 games: Cosmic Camouflage (aka Space Blaster) a single player asteroid shooter. It was written by Daniel Gallagher and was first published in this compilation. Frak! a single player platformer. It was written by Nick Pelling and was originally released in 1984 by Aardvark. Grand Prix Construction Set a racing car simulation for 1 or 2 players with a built-in track construction utility. It was written by Andrew Bradley and was originally released in 1987 by Superior/Acornsoft. Spellbinder a single player arcade adventure. It was written by Dan and Etan Shirron and was originally released in 1987 by Superior/Acornsoft.
